name: Room for thought
description:
Room for thought, a game about (not) packing your bag. Explore Persi's new room as she ponders some sentimental and some not sentimental belongings all while avoiding packing for her trip.

WASD/arrow keys to move, mouse to look. ESC to exit out of window mode.

Made for My First Game Jam Summer 2017.

Music:  Daydreamer by Podington Bear, (cc)

Font: Simplifica
